attributes.title: It work horrible 🤮👎🏻😡
attributes.review: As a trump supporter I am beyond upset what is this! 😡 I have gotten at least 5 viruses 🦠 it also freezes my phone every time I use it. 😒 will never use again!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!
attributes.review: This app is absolutely disgusting. There is no helpful information and is completely useless. I didn’t know that we were giving a taking Cheeto their own app!

attributes.title: FAKE APP!!!
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app it took me to a link (I obviously opened it) and it took me to the song “Never going to give you up” ? Or something like that I don’t know I’m to old to understand.

attributes.title: Disgraceful and Distasteful to American Values
attributes.review: I am so overwhelmingly filled with rage and anger from the lack of organization in this app. If I could give it no stars, I would. I keep getting emails and cellular text messages without my permission.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.userName: gen z will rule the world
attributes.review: I got this so I could keep up with EVERYTHING our president has to say and i am truly saddened that I did not enjoy it😭 very glitchy and not useful!     Obama was way better💖💖💖

attributes.title: Downloaded and Disappointed
attributes.review: Downloaded the app, was forced to put # and credit card info..? To make an account- didn’t want to do that! App has no use then.

attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: Thought I was gonna see Trump daddy in all his glory but was very disappointed to find his orange glow could not be appreciated through the poor quality of this app

attributes.title: DADDY TRUMP APP
attributes.review: i got this app to support daddy trump and his clear bumpy disgusting orange skin and his greasy fake hair😩🍊💦 but after downloading it it asked for my credit card number, socials, a blood sample, and to give my soul up to the cheese puff man. OVERALLL ONE OF THE WORST EXPERIENCES IN MY LIFE IS LIVING THROUGH THESE 4 YEARS. Would not recommend 🥰

attributes.title: Appalled at the low quality
attributes.review: This app couldn’t be any worse! I downloaded it to support the amazingly admirable President Cheeto Man whom i love with all my heart but this app was utterly unusable! I am reconsidering my vote after seeing this mistake!

attributes.title: good app
attributes.review: I like the app and i support our police officers.
